extName.description: Add-on name that appears as title in the browser add-on manager and in the extension catalog

extDescription.message: Context menu item to copy tooltip text ("title" attribute), "alt" image description, value of date input field, etc. to struggle with pages pretending to be friendly with text like "7 days ago" when you need actual date from tooltip for your notes.
extDescription.description: Add-on description that appears with the add-on name in the browser add-on manager and in the extension catalog. The catalog has another description that is downloaded and displayed in the details tab of the add-on manager

extAuthor.description: Add-on author is displayed in the details tab of the browser add-on manager in a table below the catalog description

copyContextMenu.description: Context menu item label for web pages

notificationErrorTitle.description: Title of notification when an error occurs

notificationWarningTitle.description: Title of notification when a warning occurs, e.g. page is inaccessible for content scripts

Internal error..description: Fallback error when an exception happens during generation of notification error

Element has no supported text attributes.message: Element has no supported text attributes.
Element has no supported text attributes.description: A part of an error or warning notification when content script finds no text attributes. May be combined into `errorNotALinkOrImage`.

Text extraction failed..description: A part of an error or warning notification when no better message can be provided. May be combined into `errorNotALinkOrImage`.

errorNotALinkOrImage.message: $EXTRACT_MSG$ The element is not a link, image, or media
errorNotALinkOrImage.description: Message of error notification when no text can be copied. Additional text to content script failure.

extract_msg.example: Element has no supported text attributes,

errorCopy.message: Copy to clipboard failed. You may try to grant the clipboard permission in the add-ons manager.
errorCopy.description: A part of notification that appears when clipboard operations fail. May be combined with text extraction error
